events.name: branchAngle
events.comment: Angle between parent and child branches.

events.name: ANGLE_INC
events.comment: How much angle to add/subtract with each scroll movement.

events.name: LENGTH_INC
events.comment: How much length to add/subtract with each scroll movement.

events.name: THICKNESS_INC
events.comment: How much thickness to add/subtract with each scroll movement.

events.name: HUE_INC
events.comment: How much HUE to add/subtract with each scroll movement.

children.text: Get a color mix between two colors.

children.functionDescription: Get a color mix between two colors.

parameters.value: lerp(colRootR, colLeafR, mix) & "|" & lerp(colRootG, colLeafG, mix) & "|" & lerp(colRootB, colLeafB, mix)

children.text: Mark children branches, and their children recursively.

actions.text: Mark this branch and its children.

parameters.width: Self.Width > rootBaseLength * childSize^(9999-Self.generation) ? Self.Width - LENGTH_INC : Self.Width

parameters.height: Self.Height > rootBaseThickness * childSize^(9999-Self.generation) ? Self.Height - THICKNESS_INC : Self.Height

children.text: Set chaos value of each branch according to a Classic 2D noise distribution.
Set edit mode back to 0 and re-enable buttons.
Some edit modes remove the selection.
